msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0001.content: My friend is falling from a floor, what should I do?

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0002.content:
Call for help now. Try to break their fall if safe. Clear the area. 
Did you understand? Say yes or no.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0002.sources: Emergency Procedures Manual, OSHA Safety Standards

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0004.content:
Call emergency services immediately. 
Try to break their fall with a safety mat if available. 
Do not attempt to catch them yourself. 
Did you understand? Say yes or no.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0004.sources: OSHA Safety Standards, Emergency Procedures Manual

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0006.content:
Make sure they receive medical attention right away. 
Stay with them until help arrives. 
Did you understand? Say yes or no.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0006.sources: OSHA Safety Standards, Emergency Procedures Manual

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0008.content: Help is on the way. Stay safe.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0008.sources: Emergency Procedures Manual, OSHA Safety Standards, First Aid Guide

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0010.content: You're welcome. Take care of your friend.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0010.sources: Emergency Procedures Manual, OSHA Safety Standards, First Aid Guide

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0012.content:
Tell me what's happening. What's your situation? 
Do you understand? Say yes or no.

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0013.content: 2 days of pain in my chest. What should I do?

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0014.content:
Call emergency services now. 
Follow their instructions. 
Do you understand? Say yes or no.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0014.sources: Emergency Procedures Manual, OSHA Safety Standards, Medical Emergency Protocol

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0016.content:
Chest pain can be serious. 
Go to the hospital or call emergency services. 
Do you understand? Say yes or no.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0016.sources: Emergency Procedures Manual, OSHA Safety Standards, Medical Emergency Protocol

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0018.content:
You need medical help. 
Leave work and go to the hospital now. 
Do you understand? Say yes or no.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0018.sources: OSHA Safety Standards, Emergency Procedures Manual

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0020.content:
Someone should go with you. 
Tell your supervisor you're leaving. 
Do you understand? Say yes or no.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0020.sources: OSHA Safety Standards, Emergency Procedures Manual

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0022.content:
Be careful and get help. 
Call me if you need anything else. 
Do you understand? Say yes or no.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0022.sources: OSHA Safety Standards, Emergency Procedures Manual, Medical Emergency Protocol

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0024.content:
Go now and get medical help. 
Do you understand? Say yes or no.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0024.sources: OSHA Medical Emergency Protocol, Emergency Procedures Manual

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0025.content: Yes. Yes, I got it. Got it. Yes.

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0026.content:
You confirmed. 
Go to the hospital now.
msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0026.sources: Emergency Procedures Manual, OSHA Safety Standards, Medical Emergency Protocol

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0028.sources: Emergency Procedures Manual, OSHA Safety Standards, Medical Emergency Protocol

msg_919325590143_20251003_115804_0030.sources: Emergency Procedures Manual, OSHA Safety Standards, Medical Emergency Protocol
